sentences.sContent: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.sCn: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

synos.tran: 大厅；休息室；会客室；游说议员的团体

phrases.pCn: n. 电梯门厅，电梯前廊
升降机大堂；升降机门廊

trans.tranOther: to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed
a group of people who try to persuade a government that a particular law or situation should be changed
